voltagent.description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents

existing.name: docx
existing.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction. When Claude needs to work with professional documents (.docx files) for: (1) Creating new documents, (2) Modifying or editing content, (3) Working with tracked changes, (4) Adding comments, or any other document tasks

voltagent.description: Collaborative document editing and co-authoring

existing.name: doc-coauthoring
existing.description: Guide users through a structured workflow for co-authoring documentation. Use when user wants to write documentation, proposals, technical specs, decision docs, or similar structured content. This workflow helps users efficiently transfer context, refine content through iteration, and verify the doc works for readers. Trigger when user mentions writing docs, creating proposals, drafting specs, or similar documentation tasks.

voltagent.description: Create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations

existing.name: pptx
existing.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. When Claude needs to work with presentations (.pptx files) for: (1) Creating new presentations, (2) Modifying or editing content, (3) Working with layouts, (4) Adding comments or speaker notes, or any other presentation tasks

voltagent.description: Create, edit, and analyze Excel spreadsheets

existing.name: xlsx
existing.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. When Claude needs to work with spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv, etc) for: (1) Creating new spreadsheets with formulas and formatting, (2) Reading or analyzing data, (3) Modify existing spreadsheets while preserving formulas, (4) Data analysis and visualization in spreadsheets, or (5) Recalculating formulas

voltagent.description: Extract text, create PDFs, and handle forms

existing.name: pdf
existing.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. When Claude needs to fill in a PDF form or programmatically process, generate, or analyze PDF documents at scale.

voltagent.description: Create generative art using p5.js with seeded randomness

Create original algorithmic art rather than copying existing artists' work to avoid copyright violations.

voltagent.description: Design visual art in PNG and PDF formats

existing.name: canvas-design
existing.description: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy. You should use this skill when the user asks to create a poster, piece of art, design, or other static piece. Create original visual designs, never copying existing artists' work to avoid copyright violations.

voltagent.description: Frontend design and UI/UX development tools

existing.name: frontend-design
existing.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with intentional aesthetics, high craft, and non-generic visual identity. Use when building or styling web UIs, components, pages, dashboards, or frontend applications.

voltagent.description: Create animated GIFs optimized for Slack size constraints

existing.name: slack-gif-creator
existing.description: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Provides constraints, validation tools, and animation concepts. Use when users request animated GIFs for Slack like "make me a GIF of X doing Y for Slack."

voltagent.description: Style artifacts with professional themes or generate custom themes

existing.name: theme-factory
existing.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.

voltagent.description: Build complex claude.ai HTML artifacts with React and Tailwind

existing.name: web-artifacts-builder
existing.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui). Use for complex artifacts requiring state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components - not for simple single-file HTML/JSX artifacts.

voltagent.description: Create MCP servers to integrate external APIs and services

existing.name: mcp-builder
existing.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools. Use when building MCP servers to integrate external APIs or services, whether in Python (FastMCP) or Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK).

voltagent.description: Test local web applications using Playwright

existing.name: webapp-testing
existing.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, capturing browser screenshots, and viewing browser logs.

voltagent.description: Apply Anthropic's brand colors and typography to artifacts

existing.name: brand-guidelines
existing.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.

voltagent.description: Write status reports, newsletters, and FAQs

existing.name: internal-comms
existing.description: A set of resources to help me write all kinds of internal communications, using the formats that my company likes to use. Claude should use this skill whenever asked to write some sort of internal communications (status reports, leadership updates, 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, incident reports, project updates, etc.).

voltagent.description: Guide for creating skills that extend Claude's capabilities

existing.name: skill-creator

voltagent.description: Web design guidelines and standards

existing.name: web-design-guidelines
existing.description: Review UI code for Web Interface Guidelines compliance. Use when asked to "review my UI", "check accessibility", "audit design", "review UX", or "check my site against best practices".

voltagent.description: Generate and explore ideas

existing.name: brainstorming

voltagent.description: Create strategic documentation

existing.name: writing-plans

existing.name: executing-plans

existing.name: dispatching-parallel-agents

Test pages, fill forms, take screenshots, check responsive design, validate UX, test login flows, check links, automate any browser task. Use when user wants to test websites, automate browser interactions, validate web functionality, or perform any browser-based testing.

voltagent.description: Write tests before implementing code

existing.name: test-driven-development
existing.description: Use when implementing any feature or bugfix, before writing implementation code

voltagent.description: Development using multiple sub-agents

existing.name: subagent-driven-development
existing.description: Use when executing implementation plans with independent tasks in the current session

voltagent.description: Methodical problem-solving in code

existing.name: systematic-debugging
existing.description: Use when encountering any bug, test failure, or unexpected behavior, before proposing fixes

voltagent.description: Complete Git code branches

existing.name: finishing-a-development-branch
existing.description: Use when implementation is complete, all tests pass, and you need to decide how to integrate the work - guides completion of development work by presenting structured options for merge, PR, or cleanup

voltagent.description: Initiate code review processes

existing.name: requesting-code-review
existing.description: Use when completing tasks, implementing major features, or before merging to verify work meets requirements

voltagent.description: Process and incorporate code feedback

existing.name: receiving-code-review
existing.description: Use when receiving code review feedback, before implementing suggestions, especially if feedback seems unclear or technically questionable - requires technical rigor and verification, not performative agreement or blind implementation

voltagent.description: Manage multiple Git working trees

existing.name: using-git-worktrees
existing.description: Use when starting feature work that needs isolation from current workspace or before executing implementation plans - creates isolated git worktrees with smart directory selection and safety verification

voltagent.description: Validate work before finalizing

existing.name: verification-before-completion
existing.description: Use when about to claim work is complete, fixed, or passing, before committing or creating PRs - requires running verification commands and confirming output before making any success claims; evidence before assertions always
